short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension enhances CoinMarketCap CSS and adds new features such as mcap/volume ratio or FDV.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Upgrade your CoinMarketCap experience with "Better CoinMarketCap," the essential Chrome extension for every crypto enthusiast. Simplify and enhance your journey on CoinMarketCap.com with our latest features designed to streamline your browsing experience and provide deeper insights into the crypto market.

**Key Features:**

- **Clean Interface:** Enjoy CoinMarketCap without the clutter of community sections and ads, focusing on what matters.
- **Market Overview Card:** Gain instant insights with the new "Market Overview" card, showcasing the total market cap, 24h volume, and BTC/ETH dominance directly on the homepage, replacing the less useful "Community" section.
- **Market Cap to Volume Ratio:** Analyze the market cap to volume ratio for each cryptocurrency with a color indicator to quickly assess the financial health of a crypto. This tool is invaluable for identifying potentially inflated market caps or cryptos with volume too low for their market cap.
- **Fully Diluted Valuation (FDV):** New feature calculates and displays the Fully Diluted Valuation next to the market cap, with dynamic color coding based on the MCAP to FDV ratio. Colors range from green (0-10%), yellow (10-50%), and red (over 50%) to provide a quick visual indicator of valuation, enhancing your investment strategy.
- **Dynamic Theme Support:** Features adapt to CoinMarketCap's day and night themes, ensuring a seamless and integrated user experience.
- **Modern Design:** Navigate CoinMarketCap with a modernized and intuitive design for easier browsing.
- **Open Source:** Transparency matters. "Better CoinMarketCap" is open source, inviting you to review and contribute on GitHub.

**Installation and Usage:**

Adding "Better CoinMarketCap" to your Chrome extensions is straightforward. Once installed, the enhancements will automatically be applied to CoinMarketCap.com. No configuration is neededâ€”just a cleaner, more intuitive, and informative experience.

**Support and Contribution:**

For support, questions, or further information, visit [our GitHub issues page](https://github.com/Decryptu/Better-CoinMarketCap/issues). Contributions are welcomed following our [contribution guidelines](CONTRIBUTING.md).

**License:**

This project is licensed under the [MIT License](LICENSE).

**Disclaimer:**

"Better CoinMarketCap" is an independent Chrome extension and is not affiliated with, endorsed, or sponsored by CoinMarketCap. All trademarks belong to their respective owners.

Discover a better way to explore the crypto market with "Better CoinMarketCap." Enhance your browsing with insightful data analysis, a clutter-free interface, and modern design. Empower your crypto journey today.
